info.description: API to create Fund Value Date
info.title: Fund Value Date details

parameters.name: command
parameters.description: API operations like INVOKE, VALIDATE, PROCESS can be set or by default PROCESS is set

recordIndicator.description: It specifies the type of record that is loaded

TAFundCode.description: Internal TA Fund ID.Allowed values are from the list of Fund IDs in MFGI.

transactionType.description: Operation code. For example: 0001(Subscription), 0002(Redemption), 0006(Transfer), 0007(Switch)etc.  The LoV is available in the CMESS table TA_COPER.

numberOfDays.description: Number of Days to add to the Trade date excluding the holidays by considering the Value Date method for the Fund and the operation.

valueDateType.description: Code for value date type to be specified only if the Value date method is 0001 - Postpone Fund Country Holiday. Allowed values are F - Fix or M - Min. If F, the system will consider the number of days defined here. If M, the system will compare the number of days at this level and at agent level and it will take the smallest one.The Lov is available from Cmess table TA_TVDATE

valueDateMethod.description: Value date method code. For example: 0001 (Method1-Postpone Fund Country holiday), 0002 (Method2- Postpone Quotation/Payment currency holiday), 0003(Skip  Quotation/Payment currency holiday) etc.. The LoV is available in the CMESS table TA_FDELAY.

holidayCountryMFFund.description: It specifies the method  to calculate the value date if there is holiday in MF country. This field is mandatory if the Value date method is Method 5-Conditional value date calculation. Allowed values: 0001(postpone the value date if there is a holiday between trade date and value date). 0002(postpone the value date if it falls on a holiday), 0003(Not applicable). The LoV is available in the CMESS table TA_VALCND.

holidayPaymentCurrency.description: It specifies the method to calculate the value date if there is holiday in Payment Currency. This field is mandatory if the Value date method is Method 5-Conditional value date calculation. Allowed values 0001(postpone the value date if there is a holiday between trade date and value date). 0002(postpone the value date if it falls on a holiday), 0003(Not applicable). The LoV is available in the CMESS table TA_VALCND.

holidayQuotationCurrency.description: It specifies the method to calculate the value date if there is holiday in Quotation currency. This field is mandatory if the Value date method is Method 5-Conditional value date calculation. Allowed values 0001(postpone the value date if there is a holiday between trade date and value date). 0002(postpone the value date if it falls on a holiday), 0003(Not applicable). The LoV is available in the CMESS table TA_VALCND.

holidayReferenceCurrency.description: It specifies the method to calculate the value date if there is holiday in Reference currency. This field is mandatory if the Value date method is Method 5-Conditional value date calculation. Allowed values 0001(postpone the value date if there is a holiday between trade date and value date). 0002(postpone the value date if it falls on a holiday), 0003(Not applicable). The LoV is available in the CMESS table TA_VALCND.

closeWeekEndFlag.description: Flag to indicate if the system should include week ends in the calculation of the value date. Allowed values: Y (for Yes), N (for No)

updateCode.description: Flag to indicate if a new record should be created or an existing record should be updated with the details. Allowed values: Y(to update), N = (to create)
